description: EUDR Traceability Connector Service - AGENT-DATA-005. Monitors plot registration, custody chain transfers, due diligence statement generation, compliance checks, risk assessments, and EU Information System submissions for EU Regulation 2023/1115.

panels.description: Total number of geolocation plots registered in the EUDR traceability system
panels.title: Total Plots Registered

panels.description: Number of currently active (non-archived, non-revoked) plots in the traceability system
panels.title: Active Plots

panels.description: Total custody chain transfers recorded across all commodities
panels.title: Custody Transfers

panels.description: Total Due Diligence Statements (DDS) generated and submitted
panels.title: DDS Generated

panels.description: Number of verifications currently pending review. High values indicate a processing backlog.
panels.title: Pending Verifications

panels.description: Rate of EUDR compliance checks performed per second, broken down by result (pass/fail/error)
panels.title: Compliance Checks Rate

panels.description: Total compliance checks grouped by EUDR article (Art. 3 Prohibition, Art. 4 Due Diligence, Art. 9 Risk Assessment, Art. 10 Risk Mitigation, etc.)
panels.title: Compliance by Article

panels.description: Ratio of compliance check results: pass, fail, and error
panels.title: Compliance Pass/Fail Ratio

panels.description: Rate of deforestation risk assessments performed per second, broken down by risk level
panels.title: Risk Assessments Rate

panels.description: Distribution of risk assessment results by risk level: high, standard, and low
panels.title: Risk Distribution

panels.description: Risk assessments broken down by target type (plot, supplier, commodity, country)
panels.title: Risk by Target Type

panels.description: Rate of submissions to the EU Information System per second, grouped by status
panels.title: EU Submissions Rate

panels.description: Distribution of EU Information System submission statuses: success, pending, error, rejected
panels.title: Submission Status

panels.description: Rate of EU Information System submission errors over time. Any sustained error rate requires investigation.
panels.title: Submission Errors

panels.description: Processing duration percentiles (p50, p95, p99) for EUDR traceability operations. SLO target: p95 < 5s.
panels.title: Processing Duration p50/p95/p99

panels.description: Rate of errors across all EUDR traceability operations, grouped by operation type
panels.title: Error Rate

panels.description: Table showing error counts by operation type for identifying the most problematic operations
panels.title: Error by Operation

panels.description: Total registered plots grouped by EUDR commodity type (cattle, cocoa, coffee, oil palm, rubber, soya, wood, derived products)
panels.title: Plots by Commodity

panels.description: Custody chain transfers grouped by EUDR commodity type
panels.title: Transfers by Commodity

panels.description: Total supplier due diligence declarations received and processed
panels.title: Supplier Declarations

title: EUDR Traceability Connector Service
